## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve? What's the use case?
**Example:** "As a [role], I need [feature] so that [benefit]."

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this feature working?

## Alternative Solutions
Are there other ways to solve this problem that you've considered?

## Mockups or Examples (Optional)
If applicable, add mockups, wireframes, or examples from other products.

## Priority
How important is this feature to your workflow?
- [ ] Critical - Can't use the product without it
- [ ] High - Major pain point
- [ ] Medium - Would be nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor improvement

## Additional Context
Any other context, screenshots, or information about the feature request.

## Are you willing to contribute?
- [ ] Yes, I'd like to work on this
- [ ] No, but I can help test it
- [ ] No, but I can help with documentation
- [ ] No, just suggesting
